meanings.definition: Officially permitted or authorized to do something.
meanings.sent1: The licensed driver safely navigated the busy streets.
meanings.sent2: She is a licensed nurse who can provide medical care.
meanings.sent3: The licensed chef accidentally added too much salt to the soup.
meanings.sent4: His licensed status as a pilot gave him the freedom to soar through the skies.
meanings.sent5: The licensed electrician quickly fixed the faulty wiring in the house.

meanings.sent1: The licensed contractor completed the construction project on time.
meanings.sent2: He is a licensed hunter and knows all the safety regulations.
meanings.sent3: The licensed fisherman caught a boot instead of a fish.
meanings.sent4: Her licensed status as a diver allowed her to explore the ocean depths.
meanings.sent5: The licensed pharmacist dispensed the correct medication to the patient.
